reviews.title: Good choice of food
reviews.text: A la carte menu with a wide choice including seafood and steaks cooked to order.The restaurant was not very busy during our stay but it was only April. I chose monkfish one night as it is something I had never chosen before - unfortunatelt it came smothered in an overpowering garlic sauce and I still don't know what monkfish tates like - it could have been anything. if it had mentioned that sauce on the menu I wouldn't have chosen it. That aside, we ate there 2 nights and every other meal was really good and no complaints with that. However, the wine was extremely expensive i.e £4.50 for a quarter bottle of wine!!!
ate here each evening during recent 4 night stay in Jersey.
